title: Lesson 13 - Ayaw; Dislike and Not Want

contents.markdown: This lesson will show you how to say that you dislike or do not want a noun using _ayaw_. How to do this with verbs will be covered in a future lesson.
\*\*Ayaw\*\*+ experiencer + indefinite object. (Tag.) = Experiencer dislikes something indefinite. (Eng.)
\*\*Notes: The experiencer is the one who dislikes, and takes _ng_ form. The indefinite object is the thing that is disliked and takes _sa_ form.\*\*
\*\*Ayaw\*\*+ experiencer + indefinite object. (Tag.) = Experiencer does not want something indefinite. (Eng.)
**Notes: The experiencer is the one who does not want, and takes _ng_ form. The indefinite object is the thing that is not wanted and takes _ng_ form.**
<u>Ayaw...ang - to dislike or not want something definite. </u>
\*\*Ayaw\*\*+ experiencer + definite object. (Tag.) = Experiencer dislikes/does not want definite object. (Eng.)
\*\*Notes: The experiencer is the one who dislikes/does not want, and takes _ng_ form. The definite object takes _ang_ form.\*\*
In theory, the _ayaw_…_ang_ construction can mean “dislike” or “not want”:

item.english: David does not want/like the chocolate.
She does not want/like this glass.
We (excl.) do not want/like their car.

contents.markdown: But in the case of proper nouns and personal pronouns, it is pretty unusual to mean “not want”, so the meaning normally defaults to “dislike”:

item.tagalog: Ayaw ni Analyn kina Angel at Maria.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ayaw ni Sir Bautista ng maraming baso.
exampleSentences.english: Mr. Bautista does not want a lot of glasses.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ayaw po ni Joshua kay David.
Ayaw na ba niya ang Maynila?
Ayaw ng anak nila ang punong yun.
exampleSentences.english: Their child does not like that tree.
They do not like white shoes.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ayaw ni Mark kina Jasmine at Luis.
exampleSentences.english: Mark does not like Jasmine and Luis.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ayaw natin ang tatlo nilang bahay.
exampleSentences.english: We (incl.) do not like their three houses.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ayaw ni Maria ang baso ni Angel.
exampleSentences.english: Maria does not want Angel's glass.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ayaw ba ninyo ng magandang sapatos?
exampleSentences.english: Do you (pl.) not want pretty shoes?
